TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed MergeOption extends System.Enum

summary.span: Specifies how objects being loaded into the object context are merged with objects already in the object context.

span.span: Specifies how objects being loaded into the object context are merged with objects already in the object context.

remarks.format: ## Remarks [!INCLUDE[adonet_ef](~/includes/adonet-ef-md.md)]只维护在缓存中具有特定实体键的对象的单个实例。The [!INCLUDE[adonet_ef](~/includes/adonet-ef-md.md)] only maintains a single instance of an object with a specific entity key in the cache. 对象是不可变对象，表示对象的标识。The objects are immutable objects that that represent object's identity. 实体键用于在对象上下文中执行标识解析。Entity keys are used to perform identity resolution in the object context. 有关详细信息，请参阅[使用实体键](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/fe3f4206-d277-43a1-a72f-4e86fdf12b9f)。For more information, see [Working with Entity Keys](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/fe3f4206-d277-43a1-a72f-4e86fdf12b9f). 如果已跟踪具有相同的标识的实体时，来自数据源和状态管理器中已有数据的数据将根据合并的查询。If an entity with the same identity is already being tracked, the data coming from the data source and the data already in the state manager are merged according to the of the query.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Data.Objects.MergeOption AppendOnly = int32(0)

summary.span: Objects that do not exist in the object context are attached to the context.

span.span: Objects that do not exist in the object context are attached to the context.

summary.span: If an object is already in the context, the current and original values of object's properties in the entry are not overwritten with data source values.

span.span: If an object is already in the context, the current and original values of object's properties in the entry are not overwritten with data source values.

summary.span: The state of the object's entry and state of properties of the object in the entry do not change.

span.span: The state of the object's entry and state of properties of the object in the entry do not change.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Data.Objects.MergeOption NoTracking = int32(3)

summary.span: Objects are maintained in a state and are not tracked in the .

span.span: Objects are maintained in a state and are not tracked in the .

summary.span: However, [!INCLUDE[adonet_ef](~/includes/adonet-ef-md.md)]-generated entities and POCO entities with proxies maintain a reference to the object context to facilitate loading of related objects.

span.span: However, [!INCLUDE[adonet_ef](~/includes/adonet-ef-md.md)]-generated entities and POCO entities with proxies maintain a reference to the object context to facilitate loading of related objects.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Data.Objects.MergeOption OverwriteChanges = int32(1)

summary.span: Objects that do not exist in the object context are attached to the context.

span.span: Objects that do not exist in the object context are attached to the context.

summary.span: If an object is already in the context, the current and original values of object's properties in the entry are overwritten with data source values.

span.span: If an object is already in the context, the current and original values of object's properties in the entry are overwritten with data source values.

summary.span: The state of the object's entry is set to , no properties are marked as modified.

span.span: The state of the object's entry is set to , no properties are marked as modified.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Data.Objects.MergeOption PreserveChanges = int32(2)

summary.span: Objects that do not exist in the object context are attached to the context.

span.span: Objects that do not exist in the object context are attached to the context.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果该实体的状态为 ，则会使用数据源值覆盖对应项中的当前值和原始值。If the state of the entity is , the current and original values in the entry are overwritten with data source values. 该实体的状态保持为 ，并且不会将任何属性标记为已修改。The state of the entity remains and no properties are marked as modified. 如果该实体的状态为 ，则不会使用数据源值覆盖已修改属性的当前值。If the state of the entity is , the current values of modified properties are not overwritten with data source values. 将使用数据源中的值覆盖未修改属性的原始值。The original values of unmodified properties are overwritten with the values from the data source. 在[!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]版本 4，[!INCLUDE[adonet_ef](~/includes/adonet-ef-md.md)]将未修改的属性的当前值与从数据源返回的值进行比较。In the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] version 4, the [!INCLUDE[adonet_ef](~/includes/adonet-ef-md.md)] compares the current values of unmodified properties with the values that were returned from the data source. 如果值不相同，则将该属性标记为已修改。If the values are not the same, the property is marked as modified. 在 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 3.5 SP1 版本中，即使数据源中的值不相同，[!INCLUDE[adonet_ef](~/includes/adonet-ef-md.md)]也不会将该属性标记为已修改。In the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] version 3.5 SP1, the [!INCLUDE[adonet_ef](~/includes/adonet-ef-md.md)] does not mark the property as modified, even if the value in the data source is different. 调用 时，只会将已修改的属性保存到数据源中。Only modified properties are persisted to the data source when you call . 若要保留 3.5 SP1 行为，请将 设置为 `true`。To preserve the 3.5 SP1 behavior, set to `true`. PreserveChanges 选项可用来保留在本地上下文中的更改时解决开放式并发异常。The PreserveChanges option can be used to resolve optimistic concurrency exceptions while preserving changes in the local context. 有关详细信息，请参阅[保存更改和管理并发](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b8378601-4f26-4a05-a24a-f50aeb68610e)。For more information, see [Saving Changes and Managing Concurrency](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b8378601-4f26-4a05-a24a-f50aeb68610e).
